description: External walking tour of the White City redevelopment. Includes new build shopping and housing.  Imperial College White City Campus and the reuse of the BBC Television Centre and Media Village. This is a major redevlopment of the area

events.name: White City in the 21st Century Walking Visit
events.notes:
Visitors can arrive at any time during the opening hours.

There may be queues at busy times.

factsheet.heading: History
paragraphs: The area was the site of a series of White City exhibitions and the Olympic Games. Part of it became the White City Estate and part was industrial.  BBC came in the 1950s.  The site is undergoing redevelopment.

location.address: Shepherds Bush Station, Uxbridge Road, W12 7FD

name: White City in the 21st Century
